How to play?

You will record seabirds from a boat as it moves along a straight line (transect). There are two types of rounds, sitting and flying birds, which will alternate as you play:

Sitting Birds

Record the BTO species code and number of birds in images, aswell as the side of the boat they appear on.

Flying Birds

As flying birds can move from one side of a vessel to the other, you will only record the species code and number.
